languages.text: "Значит, посылка с "хаос-бомбой" предназначалась мне? Кто ее отправил?"

traits.locale_text: "Значит, посылка с "хаос-бомбой" предназначалась мне? Кто ее отправил?"

languages.text: "So the 'Chaos bomb' package was meant for me? Who's the sender?"
languages.original_text: "Значит, посылка с "хаос-бомбой" предназначалась мне? Кто ее отправил?"

traits.locale_text: "So the 'Chaos bomb' package was meant for me? Who's the sender?"
"So the 'Chaos bomb' package was meant for me? Who's the sender?"
"So the 'Chaos bomb' package was meant for me? Who's the sender?"
"So the 'Chaos bomb' package was meant for me? Who's the sender?"
"So the 'Chaos bomb' package was meant for me? Who's the sender?"

languages.text: 「では、その『渾沌の爆弾』とやらは私宛てだったのか？荷主は誰だ？」
languages.original_text: "So the 'Chaos bomb' package was meant for me? Who's the sender?"

traits.locale_text: 「では、その"渾沌の爆弾"とやらは私宛てだったのか？荷主は誰だ？」

languages.text: “也就是说，这个‘混沌炸弹’本来是要寄给我的？寄件人是谁？”
languages.original_text: "So the 'Chaos bomb' package was meant for me? Who's the sender?"

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，这个‘混沌炸弹’本来是要寄给我的？寄件人是谁？”

languages.text: «Entonces, ¿esta "bomba de Caos" iba dirigida a mí? ¿Quién la envió?».
languages.original_text: "So the 'Chaos bomb' package was meant for me? Who's the sender?"

traits.locale_text: «Entonces, ¿esta "bomba de Caos" iba dirigida a mí? ¿Quién la envió?».

languages.text: « Alors cette "bombe du Chaos" m'était destinée ? De qui provenait-elle ? »
languages.original_text: "So the 'Chaos bomb' package was meant for me? Who's the sender?"

traits.locale_text: « Alors cette "bombe du Chaos" m'était destinée ? De qui provenait-elle ? »

languages.text: "Das Paket mit der 'Chaosbombe' war also für mich gedacht? Wer war der Absender?"
languages.original_text: "So the 'Chaos bomb' package was meant for me? Who's the sender?"

traits.locale_text: "Das Paket mit der 'Chaosbombe' war also für mich gedacht? Wer war der Absender?"

languages.text: "Yani bu 'Kaos bombası' paketi benim açmam mı gerekiyordu? Kim göndermiş?"
languages.original_text: "So the 'Chaos bomb' package was meant for me? Who's the sender?"

traits.locale_text: "Yani bu 'Kaos bombası' paketi benim için miydi aslında? Gönderen kimdi?"
